description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Conway in the Stereoscope. Illustrated by Roger Fenton ... With notes, descriptive and historical, by James Bridge Davidson" Author: DAVIDSON, James Bridge. Contributor: FENTON, Roger - Photographer Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10369.d.7." Page: 86 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1860 Publisher: Lovell Reeve Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000874021 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
